page.title: 09BUILDINGS
page.content: First I will start with the shop in the village.It is a small shop and sells all kinds of different things mostly food.It sells groceries besides cards,sweets,meat,vegetables fresh and canned,drinks and fruit etc. We also have a community centre.it is a big hall where adults play bingo and on Tuesdays,Wednesdays and Thursdays a youth club is held for children eleven and over. Then there is a pub called the Jolly Colliers.It has a lounge and a bar like most pubs have. We have an infants school and a junior school on different sides of the road. The infants school is made out of brick and the junior school is made out of stone. We have got houses that are old and houses that are quite new.(cont.p.10)
